com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities

Class SharedPrefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities.SharedPrefs

  • public class SharedPrefs
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for SharedPreferences handling. It utilizes Scottyab's secure-preferences for encryption purposes if utilized. This class uses his library, which is listed below: Secure Shared Prefs. Link: https://github.com/scottyab/secure-preferences compile 'com.scottyab:secure-preferences-lib:0.1.4' Created by pmacdowell on 2016/08/12.

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        sharedPrefsName - prefs name
        encryptionPassword - the password. If null, it will not have a password
        Returns:
